title: China extends threatening military exercises around Taiwan
content:
1. China extends threatening military exercises around Taiwan  The Associated Press
  2. China announces military exercises around Taiwan will be extended  Fox News
  3. China announces fresh military drills around Taiwan  CNBC
  4. By taunting the US ‘paper tiger’, China risks provoking a backlash over Taiwan  The Guardian
  5. China's Xi is a genuine threat to Taiwan and Team Biden needs to wake up  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
